description:
Conan, Ran, and Sonoko are taken to Sera`s regular ramen spot: the new location of "Ramen Ogura," where a murder previously occurred. Inside they find regulars Shono Yuna, Mizushina Sosuke, and Nakanishi Osamu eating. Conan finds the great quantities of condiments and seasoning they put in the food strange. After they leave, employee Sayo reveals a robbery murder occurred in the neighborhood a few days earlier. The police chased the culprit into the restaurant, and the customers present at the time were Shono, Mizushina, and Nakanishi...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Des ramen à tomber raide mort (1re partie)
死ぬほど美味いラーメン2 (前編)
